019
020import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
024import net.tnemc.core.transaction.history.SortedHistory;
025import net.tnemc.menu.core.Menu;
026import net.tnemc.menu.core.Page;
027import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
028import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.PageBuilder;
029import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
030import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.Icon;
031import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.DataAction;
032import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
036
037import java.util.Collections;
038import java.util.LinkedList;
039import java.util.Map;
040import java.util.Optional;
041import java.util.UUID;
042
043/**
044 * TransactionMenu
045 *
046 * @author creatorfromhell
047 * @since 0.1.2.0
048 */
049public class TransactionMenu extends Menu {
050
051  public static final int TRANSACTION_VIEW = 2;
052  public static final String TRANSACTION_PAGE_ID = "TRANSACTION_HISTORY_PAGE";
053  public static final int TRANSACTION_HISTORY_COUNT = 10;
054
055  public TransactionMenu() {
056
057    this.name = "transaction_menu";
058    this.title = "Transactions";
059    this.rows = 4;
060
061    /*
062     * Main Page
063     */
064    final Page main = new PageBuilder(1).build();
065    main.setOpen(this::handleMainPage);
066    addPage(main);
067
068    final Page view = new PageBuilder(TRANSACTION_VIEW).build();
069    main.setOpen(this::handleMainPage);
070    addPage(view);
071  }
072
073  public void handleMainPage(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
074
075    final UUID id = callback.getPlayer().identifier();
076    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(callback.getPlayer().identifier());
077
078    if(account.isPresent()) {
079
080      final SortedHistory sorted = account.get().getSorted(account.get().getIdentifier());
081
082      final int pagesPer = TRANSACTION_HISTORY_COUNT / 5;
083      final int pageDiv = (sorted.maxPages() / pagesPer);
084      final int maxPages = (sorted.maxPages() % pagesPer > 0)? pageDiv + 1 : pageDiv;
085
086      final int page = (callback.getPlayer().viewer().isPresent())? (Integer)callback.getPlayer().viewer().get().dataOrDefault(TRANSACTION_PAGE_ID, 1) : 1;
087
088      final int prev = (page <= 1)? maxPages : page - 1;
089      final int next = (page >= maxPages)? 1 : page + 1;
090
091      if(maxPages > 1) {
092
093        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("RED_WOOL", 1)
094                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPageDisplay"), id))
095                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPage"), id))))
096                                           .withActions(new DataAction(TRANSACTION_PAGE_ID, prev), new SwitchPageAction(this.name, 1))
097                                           .withSlot(0)
098                                           .build());
099
100        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GREEN_WOOL", 1)
101                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPageDisplay"), id))
102                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPage"), id))))
103                                           .withActions(new DataAction(TRANSACTION_PAGE_ID, next), new SwitchPageAction(this.name, 1))
104                                           .withSlot(8)
105                                           .build());
106      }
107
108      int slot = 9;
109      for(int i = 1; i <= 2; i++) {
110
111        final int adjustedPage = i + (page - 1);
112        if(adjustedPage > sorted.maxPages()) {
113          break;
114        }
115
116        for(final Map.Entry<Long, UUID> entry : sorted.getPage(adjustedPage).entrySet()) {
117
118          final Optional<Receipt> receipt = account.get().findReceipt(entry.getValue());
119          if(receipt.isEmpty()) {
120            continue;
121          }
122          //callback.getPage().addIcon(buildTransactionIcon(slot, receipt.get()));
123        }
124
125        slot += 2;
126      }
127    }
128  }
129
130  protected Icon buildTransactionIcon(final int slot, final UUID transaction) {
131
132    final LinkedList<Component> lore = new LinkedList<>();
133    lore.add(Component.text("Click for information."));
134
135    return new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("PAPER", 1)
136                                   .customName(Component.text(transaction.toString())).lore(lore))
137            .withSlot(slot)
138            .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(this.name, TRANSACTION_VIEW)).build();
139  }
140}
